import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; function pokemonCard(pokemon, index) { return (

{pokemon.name[0].toUpperCase() + pokemon.name.slice(1)}

HP: {pokemon.hp}

ATT  {pokemon.attack}

DEF  {pokemon.defense}

WEIGHT  {pokemon.weight}

SPEED  {pokemon.speed}

); } export default pokemonCard;
